work_areas.title: AI Backend Architecture
work_areas.description: Governance, policy, runtime, LLM, budget, RAG, and audit core.

work_areas.description: Metrics pipeline, APIs, exports, and performance gates.

work_areas.title: Template Pages Functionalization
work_areas.description: Upgrade all template routes from placeholders to production-grade starter templates with reusable patterns and OSS-backed interactions.

work_areas.title: Template UX Consistency Remediation
work_areas.description: Replace Ant Design implementations with custom component library for visual and architectural consistency

packets.title: Review all template pages and define target template patterns
packets.scope: Audit each template page route, define intended product outcomes, pick fit-for-purpose OSS libraries, and document page-specific implementation intent.

packets.title: Audit template pages and document component mapping
packets.purpose: Identify all Ant Design usages and map to existing custom components.
required_actions: Document all Ant Design components used across template pages
Map each antd component to existing custom component equivalent
Identify any missing custom components that need to be created
Create component migration checklist per template page
required_outputs: List of missing components to create
validation_checks: Component mapping covers 100% of antd usage
exit_criteria: Complete audit document exists
Component mapping approved
Ready to start page-by-page migration
halt_conditions: Existing custom components insufficient for migration

packets.title: Migrate /kanban page to custom components

Apply CSS variable-based styling
Ensure visual consistency with dashboard page
validation_checks: No antd imports remain in file
exit_criteria: Kanban page uses only custom components
Functional parity maintained
Visual consistency with existing pages
halt_conditions: Drag-drop library incompatible with custom components

packets.title: Remove Ant Design dependency and validate UX consistency
packets.purpose: Remove antd from package.json and verify all template pages maintain consistency.
required_actions: Remove antd and @ant-design/* packages from package.json
Run npm install to update lockfile
Verify npm run build succeeds
Test all 11 template routes return 200
Visual consistency check across all pages
Bundle size comparison before/after
validation_checks: No antd imports in codebase (grep verification)
Visual consistency across all pages confirmed
exit_criteria: Ant Design completely removed
All template pages use custom components
Build and tests pass
Visual consistency validated
halt_conditions: Unexpected antd dependency found in other areas
